data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Ziguinchor, Senegal be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ziguinchor, Senegal
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Ziguinchor, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 516 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Ziguinchor, Senegal to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Ziguinchor to agree with you and with one another.
Spirit, I pray that the Balanta, Ganja people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, convict the 1,015 believers in Ziguinchor to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
Jesus, help the church in the state of Ziguinchor to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.

data.section_summary:
the state of Ziguinchor, Senegal has a population of 523,800.

We estimate Ziguinchor has 1,015 people who might know Jesus, 24,000 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 498,785 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 516 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 1,015 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.
